## Fish prices {#PRdataset}

#### Description

Monthly prices of fish products for tuna and tuna-like species under IOTC mandate.

#### Conservation and Management Measures

- [IOTC Agreement](https://iotc.org/sites/default/files/documents/2012/5/25/IOTC%20Agreement.pdf) (paras. 1 and 2d) -- _Article V. Objectives, functions and responsibilities of the Commission_

#### Contents

Monthly average prices of fish per type of fish product -- i.e., processing type,  by weight category, and market.

currency,
